[30;1m70 | [0m[35m        # with no request there is no caching, so the second call errors[0m
[30;1m71 | [0m[35m        with pytest.raises(ZeroDivisionError):[0m
[30;1m72 | [0m[35m            assert auth._validate(username, password) == dict([0m
[30;1m73 | [0m[35m                status="ok",[0m
[30;1m74 | [0m[35m                from_user_object=True)[0m
[30;1m75 | [0m[35m[0m

[30;1m25 | [0m[35m    if you want to block it even if other plugins returned True then return False,[0m

[30;1m29 | [0m[35m[0m
